subHeader: To know how FusionCharts works, it is important to understand the various components and concepts of a chart

content.header: Below are different sections with interactive annotated images describing various components and concepts of charts

annotations.annotationDesc: Dataset is the entire data value representation of the plot. An array of values at each time interval.

annotationLinks.linkDesc: This data for a real-time chart is fed through multiple methods.

annotations.annotationDesc: Categories depict different classes of the data, structured for the visual representation

annotationLinks.linkDesc: It is an array of labels representing different timestamps as can be seen in the sample
